display_long_description:
In the bizarre world of Neck Braces, a spacecraft housing eggs of a parasitic alien species crashes into a temple hidden somewhere in the deserts of planet Earth. You play as the only surviving parasite to hatch from the wreckage of this ship, discovering secrets as you venture through the mysterious temple. It is up to you to uncover the cryptic truths about yourself and your mentor, Flargus Barkley.

This physics-based platformer features an innovative VR locomotion solution that has never been seen before in the world of virtual reality. Without the use of a joystick or button input, you can walk, run, jump, crouch, climb, and so much more! Intuitively use your own real-life movement to navigate through the hazardous terrain that awaits in this one of a kind parkour game!

In addition to its unique movement system, Neck Braces allows the player to dynamically interact with the world around them, using a fully physics-based character rig. This means that you can use your hands and body to push, pull, or pick up objects around you!

When used in harmony, the unique locomotion system and physical character rig create an immersive and intuitive way to interact with the virtual world!
